channel.title: Sick of crappy oversold VPS?
channel.description:
Hi, I'm Mopman, you may remember me from such films as 'Best Ex-Admin in the World' and 'Sexiest Hair 2012'. Recently I formed a company, [url=http://www.racksteady.co.uk]Racksteady Limited[/url]. We provide fast, reliable cPanel hosting and Linux VPS.
Mostly we focus on 'fully managed' services for small business clients, but we also have more traditional offerings. However, I have a mission: I want everyone on Moparscape who is serious about their server to [b]stop using Windows[/b]. But I understand that Linux is frustrating and confusing for people who aren't used to it, so I have a proposition for you.
If you order one of our [url=https://www.racksteady.co.uk/unmanaged]Unmanaged VPS[/url] and use the code MOPARSCAPE, I will not only knock 20% off the price, but throw in some special Moparscape love management as well - the VM will come ready to run Java game servers, with Java pre-installed and a graphical environment so you don't have to mess with the command line. Don't need the graphical environment? Just let us know in the additional notes section when ordering and save some precious RAM for players.
Also, if you need web hosting for your signup/forum stuff, send a support ticket and get a free cPanel account on the house - again, saving more RAM on your server for players.
Screw uncaring VPS hosts who don't understand the RS community - and screw Windows. ;)
Thanks and goodnight.
EDIT: Note for the mods - I do have permission to post this here, but I didn't know what section to put it in - that's up to you. Also, I'll keep everything in this one thread, dw. :)

item.title: Sick of crappy oversold VPS?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Jake2008, post:12, topic:449759”]sounds nice:p if there was some sort of guarantee i could get this running on linux i wud deffo switch maybe post prices too so people can see?

edit: website is offline, not really a good start =[/quote]
Unmanaged
$10 for 512mb ram and 100g traffic
$30 for 2g ram and 400g traffic
$50 for 4g ram and 1tb traffic

Just click the link >.>
And no it isn’t, it’s just slightly slow to load.

Read full topic

item.title: Sick of crappy oversold VPS?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I understand, like I said we are mostly focused on managed clients, pricing is a little different there! I can promise you our nodes are a lot less loaded than you might get at certain providers I won’t name, but if that’s not interesting to you then I guess we’re just not what you’re looking for. Cheers for considering our hosting though - if you do decide to use us, let me know in a PM and I’ll get you a coupon for that instead.

Read full topic
